page.title: 14OUR PETS
page.content: WE HAVE LOOKED AT THE DIFFERENT TYPES OF PETS THE CHILDREN IN CLASS 4K HAVE. WE ALSO SPOKE ABOUT WHY WE CHOSE OUR PETS. DOGS SEEM TO BE THE MOST POPULAR WITH CATS A CLOSE SECOND.OTHER PETS INCLUDED A TORTOISE, A WHITE RAT,RABBITS, GERBILS, HAMSTERS AND GOLDFISH. THE MAIN REASON FOR CHOOSING EITHER A DOG OR A CAT, OR BOTH, WAS THAT THEY COULD SHOW AFFECTION BACK TO THEIR OWNERS AND, IN THE CASE OF DOGS, YOU COULD TAKE THEM OUT WITH YOU FOR WALKS. THE CHILDREN WHO HAD SMALL CAGED ANIMALS SAID THAT THEY WERE NOT ALLOWED TO HAVE A LARGE PET AS THEY MADE A MESS IN THE HOUSE OR THAT IT WASN'T FAIR TO LEAVE AN ANIMAL IN THE HOME ON ITS OWN ALL DAY. THE CHILDREN SAID THEIR PETS GAVE THEM A LOT OF PLEASURE AND THAT THEY ENJOYED LOOKING AFTER THEM.
